channel.title: Satisfactory Mod Manager Stays Minimized
channel.description: I don't know if this is the right place to post this but none of the other categories seemed right to me. I had the SMM installed for a while. Update 5 rolls around on experimental so I fire it up. Everything works fine but its work time so I close it all down. When I try and launch SMM after work it "opens" but stays minimized no matter what I do. I force close it, I alt tab to it, run it as admin, whatever I can think of to make it show up not minimized to the task bar. I have uninstalled (with Revo so a good full uninstall) and reinstalled. Nothing does the trick. I am on windows 10 pro btw with epic version of satisfactory if that matters.

item.title: Satisfactory Mod Manager Stays Minimized
item.dc:creator: @Stephen_Jones Stephen Jones
item.description:
@Stephen_Jones wrote:

I don’t know if this is the right place to post this but none of the other categories seemed right to me. I had the SMM installed for a while. Update 5 rolls around on experimental so I fire it up. Everything works fine but its work time so I close it all down. When I try and launch SMM after work it “opens” but stays minimized no matter what I do. I force close it, I alt tab to it, run it as admin, whatever I can think of to make it show up not minimized to the task bar. I have uninstalled (with Revo so a good full uninstall) and reinstalled. Nothing does the trick. I am on windows 10 pro btw with epic version of satisfactory if that matters.

Read full topic
